info.description: API documentation for the Solar Energy Management System.
info.title: Solar Energy Management System API

get.description: Get statistics for Admin dashboard
Get all devices in the system
Get details of a specific device
Get current power generation stats for a device
Get a list of all installers
Get a list of users, optionally filtered by role

post.description: Create a new user (SuperAdmin/Admin can create users/admins/installers)

get.description: Get detailed information for a specific user

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get statistics for the government dashboard (counts of pending, approved, rejected, disbursed)
Get a history of processed subsidies (Approved, Rejected, Disbursed)
Get a list of users with PENDING subsidy status

put.description: Approve or Reject a subsidy application

get.description: Get a list of jobs available for installation

post.description: Mark an installation job as complete and link a device

get.description: Get tickets assigned to current installer
Get a list of all inventory items

post.description: Create a new item in the inventory (Admin only)

get.description: Get details of a specific inventory item
Get basic plant info for public map
Get a list of all administrators (SuperAdmin only)

post.description: Create a new user (SuperAdmin/Admin can create users/admins/installers)

get.description: Get detailed information for a specific user
Get all devices in the system
Get details of a specific device
Get current power generation stats for a device
Get energy analytics and statistics
Get historical energy data
Get aggregated energy trends (Super Admin only)
Get global statistics for SuperAdmin
Get full system hierarchy (Region -> Plant -> Admin -> User)
Get a list of all installers
Get a list of all power plants
Get details of a specific power plant
Get a list of all regions
Get statistics grouped by region
Get a list of users, optionally filtered by role
Get all devices for the current user

post.description: Create a new device for the current user

get.description: Get details of a specific device
Get current power generation stats for a device

post.description: Regenerate the API key for a device

get.description: Get energy analytics and statistics
Get historical energy data
Get profile of the currently logged-in user
Get solar profile for the current user

put.description: Update solar-specific profile settings for the user

get.description: Get current user's tickets
Get current weather and forecast for a location

gallery.description: JSON string of additional image URLs
